name: LineCommenter
description:
Toggle Comment state of line.(C/C++/Java/perl/python/ruby/awk/sh/104 languages)

<Esc>cc     Toggle comment state of the current line
<Esc>ncc   Toggle n straight lines.

Supported file type:    Over 104 languages

   //:        C, C++, java, javascript, etc.
   #:        awk, makefile, perl, python, ruby, sed, sh, etc.
   ":         vim
   ':         asp, basic, vbscript
   ;:         asm, ini, etc.
   rem :  bat
   --:       sql, etc.
   %:      matlab, tex, etc.
...
install_details: Just drop this script file into vim's plugin directory.

versions.release_notes:
1.Some optimization
2.Add some new languages,  total 104 languages
